creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Oku yama ni/ momiji fumiwake/ naku shika no/ koe kiku toki zo/ aki wa kanashiki 奥山に　紅葉ふみわけ　鳴く鹿の　声きくときそ　秋はかなしき
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: One Hundred Poems Explained by the Nurse (Hyakunin isshu uba ga etoki 百人一首うはか縁説)
signed: Saki no Hokusai Manji 前北斎卍
title: Poem by Sarumaru Dayū
